docs.abstract: Bucks blog notes the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau, to educate consumers about overdraft fees, is proposing a fee penalty box on checking account statements. (M)0
docs.lead_paragraph: As part of an effort to educate consumers about overdraft fees, the new federal consumer watchdog agency is proposing a ''fee penalty'' box to be included on checking account statements. Banks charge overdraft fees when customers spend more than is available in their checking account. The form is the latest in a series of ''plain language'' financial disclosures proposed by the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau.

docs.snippet: An article on Wednesday about Jeff Teague, a point guard for the Atlanta Hawks, misstated the given name of a younger brother who is a freshman guard at the University of Kentucky. He is Marquis Teague, not Marcus....
docs.lead_paragraph: An article on Wednesday about Jeff Teague, a point guard for the Atlanta Hawks, misstated the given name of a younger brother who is a freshman guard at the University of Kentucky. He is Marquis Teague, not Marcus.

docs.snippet: Warren Buffett, in his annual letter to Berkshire Hathaway shareholders, said for the first time that he had chosen a successor to lead the company, but he did not name the candidate....
docs.lead_paragraph: Warren Buffett, in his annual letter to Berkshire Hathaway shareholders, said for the first time that he had chosen a successor to lead the company, but he did not name the candidate.

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  DELANEY, GEORGE T.

docs.snippet: DELANEY--George T.,84, of Bedford Hills, NY on February 22, 2012. He was an attorney for over 50 years and was very active in state and local politics. George is the beloved husband of Carol Delaney and the loving father of Danielle Meehan, Suzann...
docs.lead_paragraph: DELANEY--George T.,84, of Bedford Hills, NY on February 22, 2012. He was an attorney for over 50 years and was very active in state and local politics. George is the beloved husband of Carol Delaney and the loving father of Danielle Meehan, Suzanne McCarthy, Shelagh Thomas, Kimberly Johnson; and Thomas Delaney, also survived by nine grandchildren. Friends may visit on Sunday, February 26 from 2-4 and 7-9pm at Clark Associates Funeral Home, 4 Woods Bridge Road, Katonah, NY. A Mass of Christian Burial will be held 11:00am on Monday, February 27 at St. Patrick's R.C. Church, Route 22, Bedford Village, NY. Burial will follow at Middle Patent Rural Cemetery, Banksville, NY. In lieu of flowers, memorial contributions may be made to The Lions Club of Bedford Hills, NY PO Box 156, Bedford Hills, NY 10507.

docs.snippet: WALLACH--Isidor (Wally), on February 23, 2011. Beloved and treasured husband of Ida. Devoted father and father-in-law of Meralee and Arthur Silverman, and Loralee and Philip Granowitz. Cherished grandfather of Danny, Peter, Andy and Kenny. Dear si...
docs.lead_paragraph: WALLACH--Isidor (Wally), on February 23, 2011. Beloved and treasured husband of Ida. Devoted father and father-in-law of Meralee and Arthur Silverman, and Loralee and Philip Granowitz. Cherished grandfather of Danny, Peter, Andy and Kenny. Dear sister-in-law of Maralyn Chaliff. Services Sunday 11:45am at "The Riverside," 76th Street and Amsterdam Avenue.
